name: Movie Debuts of Five Actresses Quiz | Movies | 5 Questions

questions.explanation:
10 to Midnight.

	Kelly had her film debut in this Charles Bronson action thriller from 1983.  Her character's name was Doreen.

Tootsie.

	Geena Davis got her start playing soap actress April.  An added trivia note, Geena gave birth to her first child, a daughter, Alizah on April 10, 2002.

LA on $5 a Day.

	Lisa's first role was as a charmer in this 1989 film.

Kuffs.

	Ashley played the wife of a paint store owner.

My Bodyguard.

	She played Clifford's friend, Shelley in this 1980 film.
